Package org.opensearch.sdk.rest

package org.opensearch.sdk.rest
  • Related Packages

    Description

  • Class
    Description
    BaseExtensionRestHandler
    Provides convenience methods to reduce boilerplate code in an ExtensionRestHandler implementation.
    BaseExtensionRestHandler.DeprecatedRouteHandler
    A subclass of RestHandler.DeprecatedRoute that includes a handler method for that route.
    BaseExtensionRestHandler.ExtensionDeprecationRestHandler
    ExtensionDeprecationRestHandler provides a proxy for any existing ExtensionRestHandler so that usage of the handler can be logged using the DeprecationLogger.
    BaseExtensionRestHandler.RouteHandler
    A subclass of RestHandler.Route that includes a handler method for that route.
    ExtensionRestHandler
    This interface defines methods which an extension REST handler (action) must provide.
    ExtensionRestPathRegistry
    This class registers REST paths from extension Rest Handlers.
    ReplacedRouteHandler
    A subclass of RestHandler.ReplacedRoute that includes a handler method for that route.
    SDKHttpRequest
    This class helps to get instance of HttpRequest
    SDKRestRequest
    This class helps to get instance of RestRequest

    TestExtensionRestHandler
     
    TestExtensionRestPathRegistry
